qShowSystem.desc: Shows the system tables if set to true.

qShowHidden.desc: Shows the hidden fields if set to true.

qShowSemantic.desc: Show the semantic fields if set to true.

qShowSrcTables.desc: Shows the tables and fields present in the data model viewer if set to true.

qShowDefinitionOnly.desc: Shows the fields defined on the fly if set to true.

qShowDerivedFields.desc: Shows the fields and derived fields if set to true.

qShowImplicit.desc: Shows the Direct Discovery measure fields if set to true.
